attributes.title: I am disappointed.
attributes.review: At first I thought all the bad reviews came from ANTIFA followers and low blow Gen Z sheep, however to my surprise, this app completely failed on me. It is a shame I am having to write this review, god bless the creators of this horrible app, they know where they are going. Not only does the app buffer and glitch, it took approximately two hours to download. I would like to get in contact with this apps customer service hotline IMMEDIATELY, and have a civil conversation with their executives.

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review:
I downloaded this to be more informed and instead it went ahead and stole my dog and sold it on eBay which I then ordered back to my house when suddenly my fridge exploded from the glitches the app gave it very very disappointed because my dog was also indeed in the microwave watching it all happening when suddenly I tried to deleted the app and it scanned me in the eyes and say bye bye buddy which is the name of my dog then my dog buddy exploded into tiny little bits 😞
Sincerely disappointed

attributes.title: My ankles are broken over this app 👠
attributes.review: I would not recommend this app to anyone, not even my friend who also enjoying hiding away in basements🩹 As soon as you open the app so my phone instantly froze🥶, then shut down.  It made me really sad because recently my hubby has became a pile of ash⚱️ So I am unable to contact my family about the lost😔  I would like to use my phone to use the flashlight to go down the basement to get some rope ⛓but I can’t because of this app.😡

attributes.title: Bad Cheeto puff app
attributes.review: So. Basically I went shopping for Cheeto puff but they were all gone so then I went to wall wart it get. Carrots but they were all  so I got on my Teddy bear and left and wen I got home I was mad so I got on this app and. Donald Trump Was. Orange obviously th and. took my. Snacks and every time I look app his Orange face I won’t to punch him cuz nobody take my snack  so me and  rolling ray are going To be in dc ridding our pet weilchiars to  the Walmart to eat at the finest restaurant in dc aka Walmart  ps don’t vote for trump  see you at wall mart thank you have a great day

attributes.title: Absolutely disgusting
attributes.review: If you download this app it puts so many bugs on your phone!!!! I now have a virus called the dump truck where it dumps crazy photos of trump on my screen!!!!! They are gross!!!!!!! I am sick and tired of being harassed by this app!! Republicans, are you with me???? Ugh another screen just popped up and it was so disturbing!!! Trumps wee woo is out!!! Its this long!! - !!! CUSTOMER SERVICE WAS TERRIBLE!!! The lady on the phone was barking at me and telling me all these spells and i was crying and she told me to go to the adoption center😭 I AM 35!!!!!

attributes.title: It gave my phone a virus :(
attributes.review: I downloaded this app, put my information in and now I get random text messages about Don Don’s  fake tans. It’s really gross. Idk who’s sending them but no one wants to read about how he uses orange Crayola marker ink to tie dye his skin. I deleted the app and the text messages stopped, but now I receive letters in the mail begging me to put the app back on my phone. I refuse to cave in. Long story short, I’m giving this app one star because I didn’t like the color of the font.

attributes.title: worst app in the 🌍🪐💫
attributes.review:
after downloading this app I suddenly felt ill, all brain cells seemed to have completely left my body. As I put my cat on her leash and laced up my rollerblades, my vision felt fuzzy & my body began to shake; then I remember i just had too much ice coffee, whoops!!! Heheh...Anyways this app is an utter disgrace to the world and should be removed from the App Store immediately. It’s truly the worst app in history and no one should ever have to look at this app ever again. 

Negative star review for me and all of 
Gen z💋💄💋🧚‍♀️xoxo

attributes.title: Here’s the story
attributes.review: So……I was mopping the grass in front of my church and Cthulhu came from the sky and stole my pocket mace so I couldn’t protect my family from the bison of North Dakota. THEN my family went to Wendy’s to get a $1 McFlurry  or whatever and THIS APP MADE A Barrier SO I COULDNT GET IN SO I WAS STUCK IN THE MIDDLE OF A BISONS STOMACH WITHOUT MY MILKSHAKE. I’m forever annoyed. But once Me and my caravan got pooped out I was all sunburnt because this app stole all my aloe and SPF 100. Then I went to go get saved and I couldn’t find any transportation services on this app DO NOT RECOMMEND. Had to ride Bison home.

attributes.title: Worst app ever!
attributes.review: This app is horrible and not worth the time or space it glitches so much one time it deleted by itself and I had to download it again! When u click on something it doesn’t work or it takes u out of the app itself! It needs a huge upgrade I’m not satisfied with what I download, and it doesn’t look like many are ether. Trumps app is not good their to many problems to say all in one! I give this a one star if I could I’d put a -5..

I downloaded this app to try and keep updated on the President’s campaign, but instead all I found was a bunch of propaganda and nonsensical gibberish from some orange dinosaur. Also, when I put in my info into the app it immediately started glitching and my phone froze and now seems to have some kind of virus.🦠 I am beyond disappointed with the fact that this app is so poorly made yet still available to download. Don’t risk your safety stay away from this app!
